1.00.name: wordpress/wp-text2image
1.00.description: One problem applicant on the Web is the inability to use special plugin, with this plugin can work around this problem. Indeed loading in the directory "fonts/" the font you want, we can convert any text string or title in the images. The interface is very simple and with a very comprehensive guide that can be found at the following link. http://text2image.webup.org
